plugins.name: StyleSnap - Create AI Icons in Any Style
plugins.description:
Effortlessly create custom icons in any style with StyleSnap ‚Äì the smart Figma plugin that brings AI-powered icon generation right where you work.


Whether you're designing a sleek UI or crafting a detailed illustration, StyleSnap lets you instantly replicate any icon style and generate new icons in seconds ‚Äì all royalty-free and within Figma.


Perfect for designers who love consistency, speed, and creativity.


üéØ Right-Click Style Capture: Instantly capture the style of any icon in your Figma file with a simple right-click.


üñåÔ∏è AI-Powered Icon Generation: Describe the icon you want, and StyleSnap will create it to match the style you selected ‚Äì from minimal to highly illustrative.


‚ôæÔ∏è Style Agnostic: Works with any style ‚Äì flat, outlined, detailed, 3D-inspired, or even hand-drawn.


üé® Perfect for UI & Illustrations: Whether you're building out a clean interface or adding a creative touch, StyleSnap generates icons that feel perfectly on-brand.


üîì Royalty-Free Icons: All generated icons are yours to use freely, with no licensing worries.


‚ö° No Asset Library Needed: Skip the endless searches. Just pick a style, describe your icon, and go.


üë®‚Äçüé® Great for Teams & Solo Designers: Maintain design consistency across projects without extra effort or asset juggling.


How to use the plugin?

  4. Let the plugin generate it for you ‚Äì in the exact style, ready to use and royalty-free.

plugins.name: logoplacer
plugins.description:
Logo Placer simplifies the process of adding multiple logos to your designs while maintaining clean spacing and visual consistency. Perfect for partner sections, client showcases, sponsor walls, and more.


Features:

Upload up to 4 logos with automatic placement

Smart resizing that maintains logo aspect ratios

Multi-frame support ‚Äì Select multiple frames and place logos simultaneously

Dynamic scaling based on frame size

Equal spacing between logos, every time

Reset button to quickly start over

Clean and intuitive interface


Ideal For:

Creating partner/client sections

Designing sponsor walls

Showcasing collaborations

Building marketing materials

Presenting design portfolios


How to Use:

  1. Select one or more frames in your design
  2. Open the Logo Placer plugin
  3. Upload up to 4 logos
  4. Watch as they're automatically resized, placed, and spaced
  5. Hit reset to start fresh anytime


Why Use Logo Placer?

When you have a lot of design assets and deadlines, placing logos manually can be tedious and error-prone. You often deal with:


  1. Inconsistent sizing
  2. Uneven spacing
  3. Manual alignment headaches

Logo Placer removes that friction by automating placement and ensuring a professional layout every time‚Äîno grids, nudging, or guesswork needed.
plugins.tagline: "Automatically arrange and space multiple logos in your designs"

plugins.name: Page Forge
plugins.description:
Create templates for page names and apply them across all your projects.


Especially useful for teams with different types of projects or organizations.


How it works:

Create page templates.

  1. Name the pages in your project as you want them to be replicated throughout your document.
  2. Save the template to use it in other documents.


Apply the template.

  1. Create your document.
  2. Apply the template you want to use.


Export and import templates.

  1. Share your templates with your team.
  2. Import templates created by other users.


---

Documentation here: Documentation

Made by Eduardo Higareda

plugins.name: Clean Gradients
plugins.description:
Problem:

When using a standard gradient with two colors, if there is a large gap between their tones, the saturation in the middle decreases significantly, and the color in this area may appear grayish-resulting in a ¬´muddy¬ª shade.


Solution:

With just two clicks, the plugin eliminates the ¬´muddy¬ª effect in the middle of the gradient by adding three additional intermediate color stops.


How to use the plugin:

1. The colors for the initial gradient can be taken either from an existing gradient element by selecting it and clicking the ¬´Pick gradient¬ª button or by using the ¬´Color Picker¬ª tool on the left and right of the button.

2. To apply the gradient, select the desired element and click the ¬´Apply gradient¬ª button.
plugins.tagline: Cleans the gradient from ¬´dirt¬ª

plugins.name: Mercurius - Smart Exporter for WEBP, PNG, and JPG
plugins.description:
üé® Mercurius - Smart Exporter for WEBP, PNG, and JPG


Mercurius is a Figma plugin that analyzes and exports images in multiple formats (WEBP, PNG, or JPG) with AI-generated descriptions. The plugin uses OpenAI's API to generate accurate descriptions and suggest meaningful file names while automatically optimizing file size.


Quick Export Mode üì¶

For when you just need to export images quickly with optimization


  1. Select an image, frame, or component in Figma
  2. Click "Export Image" on the home screen
  3. You'll see: selected frame name, image dimensions, aspect ratio
  4. Configure export settings: choose format (WEBP, PNG, or JPG), set maximum file size in MB, select export scale (1x, 2x, 3x, 5x)
  5. Click "Export" to save your optimized image


AI-Powered Export Mode ü§ñ

For when you want AI assistance with descriptions and smart file naming


  1. Select an image, frame, or component in Figma
  2. First-time setup: Enter your OpenAI API key: the key will be securely saved for future use
  3. Click "Analyze Image" on the home screen
  4. The AI will analyze and provide: smart image description, SEO-friendly file name suggestion, image dimensions and aspect ratio
  5. Configure export settings: choose format (WEBP, PNG, or JPG), set maximum file size in MB, select export scale (1x, 2x, 3x, 5x)
  6. Click "Export" to save your image with the AI-suggested name



Both modes feature automatic image optimization to meet your file size requirements while maintaining the best possible quality.
plugins.tagline: Smart image analysis and export for WEBP, PNG, or JPG with GPT descriptions and size optimization

plugins.name: Writing Assistant
plugins.description:
The AI Writing tools for designers

It helps you refine your UX copywriting, make it more concise, friendly, and scannable using AI.

  1. Super easy to use, one click to refine the copywriting
  2. 5 variants in one request
  3. Modifications are adjustable from light to heavy


How does it works?

The AI writer will analyze and refine your original content from three metrics: concise, friendly, and scannable. Just one click, you will get the refined copywriting, the changes of score of these three metrics can help you make decision from those 5 refined variants.


Scientifically define good copywriting

The model is base on Microsoft style guide, thanks to the efforts of these talented designers, we are able to know how to evaluate a copywriting and how to improve it.
plugins.tagline: Refine your UX copy writing to make it more concise, friendly and scannable.

plugins.description:
üé® Randominator - The Ultimate Figma Randomization Tool


Transform your designs with powerful randomization capabilities! Randominator lets you quickly create variations of your selected elements with just a few clicks.


‚ú® Features:


üéØ Transform Properties

‚Ä¢ Scale: Randomize size between 0.1x and 4x

‚Ä¢ Rotation: Set custom angle ranges from -180¬∞ to 180¬∞

‚Ä¢ Lock Aspect Ratio option for proportional scaling


üé® Color Properties

‚Ä¢ Fill Colors: Randomize HSL values and opacity

‚Ä¢ Stroke Colors: Independent control over stroke colors

‚Ä¢ Fine-tune color variation with:

- Hue Range (0-1)

- Saturation Range (0-1)

- Lightness Range (0-1)

- Alpha/Opacity Range (0-1)


üìë Layer Management

‚Ä¢ Randomize layer stacking order

‚Ä¢ Works with multiple selected objects

‚Ä¢ Maintains object center positions


üîÑ Perfect for:

‚Ä¢ Creating design variations

‚Ä¢ Generating unique patterns

‚Ä¢ Exploring different color combinations

‚Ä¢ Adding organic movement to your designs

‚Ä¢ Quick prototyping and ideation


üí° Pro Tips:

‚Ä¢ Combine different properties for unique results

‚Ä¢ Works with Frames, Components, Instances, and Groups

plugins.description: Export SVG to Power BI by ventriloc streamlines the process of integrating custom SVG's visuals into Power BI. Instead of manually recreating designs, simply export your Figma frame as an SVG, paste it into a Power BI measure, and tweak the code to incorporate dynamic elements like measures and variables. This tool is perfect for designers and analysts who want full creative control over their Power BI visuals without the hassle of complex coding. Want to see more of what ventriloc can do? Visit our website ventriloc.ca !

plugins.name: Radial & Angular Blur FX
plugins.description:
Radial & Spin Blur is a professional Figma plugin that lets you add cinematic zoom or spin blurs in seconds while keeping full creative control.


Radial Blur (Zoom). Simulates rushing toward/away from a point (motion graphics, depth focus).

Spin Blur (Angular). Rotates pixels around a center (energetic, surreal visuals).

Anaglyph 3D (optional). Adds subtle red/cyan offset (retro depth accents).


Key features

  1. Live Preview ‚Äì Resizable preview area shows the effect before you commit.
  2. 5 √ó 5 Focal-Point Grid ‚Äì Pick any corner, edge, or true center.
  3. Smooth Intensity Slider ‚Äì From whisper-soft haze to dramatic streaks.
  4. Large-Image Support ‚Äì Works on layers / frames up to 1000 px with smart scaling.
  5. No Clipping ‚Äì Padding logic prevents cut-offs even at high values or off-center points.
  6. One-Click Apply ‚Äì Happy with the look? Hit Apply and you‚Äôre done.
  7. Modern UI ‚Äì Fast, accessible, dark-mode aware.
  8. Usage Analytics ‚Äì Pseudonymous event data is sent to Amplitude to improve performance and roadmap decisions (no personal identifiers are collected).


Typical workflow

  1. Select a layer or frame (‚â§ 1000 px).
  2. Pick Radial (Zoom) or Spin (Angular).
  3. Set the center on the 5√ó5 grid and adjust intensity.
  4. Preview the result live.
  5. Apply the blur ‚Äî undo-friendly and non-destructive.


Perfect for

UI/UX designers, illustrators, social-media creators, or anyone who wants studio-grade motion blurs inside Figma.


Built with TypeScript, Figma Plugin API, and Amplitude telemetry for anonymous usage insights.
plugins.tagline: Zoom- or spin-style blur with live preview, 5√ó5 focal grid, anaglyph toggle, and one-click apply.

plugins.name: DTÁªÑ‰ª∂È´ò‰∫Æ DT Component Highlighting
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to visually highlight suspected components within a design, making it easier to locate and manage components. The plugin is ideal for users who need to inspect multiple components and interact with them quickly.


Function Description

‚Ä¢Highlight suspected components in selected frames.

‚Ä¢Locate and zoom into components within your Figma file.

‚Ä¢Export thumbnails of components for visual reference.

‚Ä¢Easily toggle component highlight on and off.


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames from your Figma file.

2.Click the ‚ÄúShow Component Highlight‚Äù button to highlight suspected components.

3.View the component list with thumbnails and names.

4.Click the ‚ÄúLocate‚Äù button to zoom in and select a specific component.

5.To remove the highlight, click ‚ÄúHide Component Highlight.‚Äù


Notes

‚Ä¢The highlighted components are based on the plugin‚Äôs interpretation and might not fully match actual component usage.

‚Ä¢The plugin‚Äôs results are for reference purposes and may vary depending on design complexity.

plugins.name: PageStream
plugins.description:
The ultimate Figma plugin you need to create, manage, and share Figma file templates. Whether you‚Äôre working solo or part of a large team, this plugin ensures consistency and efficiency when creating design projects. Sound interesting? Create your account and run the plug-in


How it works?

  1. Create and activate your account
  2. Go back to Figma
  3. Log in the plugin
  4. Start creating your templates


Why do I need an account?

You need to create an account to save your templates and use them anytime you need.


What you can do with PageStream?

  1. Generate different templates for your teams or kinds of projects.
  2. Edit or delete the different templates.
  3. Drag and drop the pages to reorganize the list easily when editing.
  4. Did we mention that you can SAVE your file templates?
  5. And YES! Of course you can add emojis


Why did we create PageStream?

We‚Äôre really passionate about creating and learning new things, and we absolutely love remote work and team collaboration.

We‚Äôve observed that many teams struggle with inconsistent files, which can make cross-functional and team collaboration a bit tricky. Moreover, all designers know that spending time creating pages can be pretty tedious. So, we challenged ourselves to solve these two problems over the weekend.


We have ideas for the next version, but please, if you have any recommendations or feedback, let us know. We hope you find this plugin handy!


Enjoy the day!
plugins.tagline: Create and save templates for your design file structure.

plugins.name: PrinTriX (Precise CMYK Color Suite)
plugins.description:
üñ®Ô∏è How to Use PrinTriX (Precise CMYK Color Suite)

PrinTriX is a tool designed for professionals who need accurate CMYK color control for print-ready designs. Here's how to get started:


  1. Go to the Color Palette tab


  1. Add your design colors (in RGB).


  1. Assign CMYK values to each RGB color for precise color mapping.


  1. Enable Color Palette Export: When exporting your design, make sure the Color Palette feature is enabled.


  1. PrinTriX will convert the colors of your design using your custom RGB‚ÜíCMYK mappings.


With these steps, PrinTriX ensures consistent and high-quality CMYK output for your print files.


Whether you're working on marketing materials, packaging, or brand assets, PrinTriX allows designers to confidently transition from digital design to high-quality print. By supporting advanced features like color profile control, frame selection, and DPI adjustments, the plugin gives teams the precision and flexibility needed to meet even the most demanding print standards. With PrinTriX, maintaining visual consistency across all printed media becomes simple, reliable, and efficient‚Äîright from within Figma.

  1. Fine-tune colors with color palette feature that maps RGB colors to your desired CMYK color
  2. Select and organize only the frames you need
  3. Control DPI to balance print quality with file size.
  4. Export Designs to CMYK/Grayscale/RGB print-ready PDFs.
plugins.tagline: CMYK, Print, ColorProfile, PDF, Export, DPI, Bleed

plugins.name: Geometric Tile Pattern SVG Generator
plugins.description:
Geometric Pattern Generator is a Figma plugin for creating beautiful, customizable geometric patterns. Built for designers who need professional-quality patterns fast, this plugin provides generation with granular control.


Key Features:


  1. Smart Generation: Instantly create unique patterns with randomized settings or manually adjust rows, columns, block size, colors, and big blocks chances
  2. Multiple Export Options: Download as PNG or SVG, or insert patterns directly into your Figma canvas as vector or raster graphics
  3. Developer-Friendly: View and copy HTML & CSS code, raw SVG markup, or URL-encoded versions for seamless web integration
  4. Smooth Workflow: Intuitive interface with real-time preview, smooth animations, and one-click generation


Perfect for creating backgrounds, textures, brand elements, or decorative graphics. Generate backgrounds for apps, websites, presentations, or print materials, get professional geometric patterns that would take hours to create manually ‚Äì in just seconds.

From concept to code, this plugin bridges the gap between design and development, making it essential for modern design workflows.

plugins.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages

‚Ä¢ No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

plugins.name: FillGPT
plugins.description:
FillGPT is an AI-powered Figma plugin designed to improve workflow efficiency by automating content generation, text optimization, and design analysis. It helps designers, copywriters, and product teams enhance UI copy, rename layers, and analyze design best practices.


Key features:


- Smart layer renaming to keep files organized

- AI-generated content for UI elements and marketing copy

- Copy enhancement, including expanding, shortening, and rephrasing text

- Tone and style adjustment to match different contexts

- Design analysis to improve clarity, accessibility, and readability

- Grammar and spelling error detection and correction

- Text summarization and expansion for better content flow


FillGPT streamlines the design process, ensuring high-quality text and a more efficient workflow within Figma.

Design Asset QR Codes ‚Äì Allow users to generate QR codes that link to downloadable assets or design system documentation.

Social Media Links ‚Äì Add options to create QR codes linking to social media profiles or portfolios directly from the design canvas.

Customizable Frames ‚Äì Offer stylish frames or borders around QR codes to make them fit different design aesthetics.

Bulk QR Code Generation ‚Äì Allow generating multiple QR codes at once for product packaging, business cards, or event badges.

networkAccess.reasoning: Required for QR code generation functionality
